content: I didn't think I could earn Kroger fuel points on online purchases from other stores. Thanks for clarifying! I'll just make sure to earn rewards and discounts through their loyalty programs instead. By the way, speaking of loyalty programs, I accumulated 15,000 points, which is equivalent to $15 in rewards, today through the Walgreens Balance Rewards program, so I'm feeling pretty good about saving some extra cash. Do you think I could earn more points by shopping during Walgreens' sales or using their digital coupons?
